```jsx live
import { Popover, PopoverTrigger, PopoverArrow, PopoverClose, PopoverContent, Button } from "@sparrowengg/twigs-react";

export default function PopoverDemo() {
  return (
    <Popover>
      <PopoverTrigger asChild>
        <Button>Trigger the popover</Button>
      </PopoverTrigger>
      <PopoverContent>
        Hello there
        <PopoverClose>Close me</PopoverClose>
        <PopoverArrow />
      </PopoverContent>
    </Popover>
  );
}
```
